solution_line_template: Bucket B has {b_more_than_c} more fruits than C (which has {bucket_c} fruits) for a total of {bucket_c}+{b_more_than_c} = <<{b_more_than_c}+{bucket_c}={bucket_b}>>{bucket_b} fruits
Bucket A has {a_more_than_b} more fruits than B (which has {bucket_b} fruits) for a total of {bucket_b}+{a_more_than_b} = <<{a_more_than_b}+{bucket_b}={bucket_a}>>{bucket_a} fruits
All three buckets have a total of {bucket_c}+{bucket_b}+{bucket_a} = <<{bucket_c}+{bucket_b}+{bucket_a}={total_fruit}>>{total_fruit} fruits
